summary: This mod allows to map shouts of Dovahkiin Relaxes Too mod to the menu of Easy Wheelmenu and of course, you could hide them for cleaner power list.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Objective of this mod :[/b][/u]

To use Dovahkiin Relaxes Too you have to cast a power spell. With this mod, you can execute actions throught the menu interface provided my Easy Wheelmenu mod.
No more need to switch off your precious Tiid Klo Ul if want to relax some time, dancing, praying, und so weiter.
Easy Wheelmenu offers the option to hide the shouts allowing a cleaner list.

[u][b]Requirement :[/b][/u]
This mod needs :
- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13931]Dovahkiin Relaxes Too[/url]
- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69878?tab=description]Easy Wheelmenu[/url]

No particular load order is needed.

[u][b]Acknowledgments :[/b][/u]

[/list]
author: ZoboZeWarrior
